comments.author: Hassaan
comments.content: greetings to everyone is there any entry fee for this expedition plz mention it also and timings also.

comments.author: Salim Khan
comments.content: Hi Hassan, unfortunately its full up this time around, but the second expedition is scheduled for the first week of february 2007. You can send in the make, model, etc., of your 4×4 and the number of people who will accompany you on the trip.

comments.author: Hassaan
comments.content: thankyou for informing me. Insha Allah i’ll be there with u guyz in ur next expedition. I cannot tell the vehicle info because currently we have Suzuki long chassis but plannig to buy an other 4X4 also.

comments.author: Pervez
comments.content: I have a toyota twin cabin hilux 4×4 and would be interested in joining your next trip to dureji in feb.

comments.author: Salim Khan
comments.content: Hi, Pervez, you are most welcome to join us on the next trip….hopefully by next week we will be able to show you some pictures of the trip this weekend and tell you it all went…..our next trip is in the first week of february 2007

comments.author: Fahad Ali
comments.content: Any Pics reg the same tour.Plz update them on web site..

comments.author: Salim Khan
comments.content: Well, the pictures are on their way and should be up shortly……meanwhile, the next trip is on the cards…..it consists of a drive up a 4,000 ft high mountain in the same region….there is a off road track going all the way up and it takes about 2 1/2 hours from the base to the top….with a night stay up there and then back to camp at Sorh for another night……
